name: GRASP
tagline: A visual RDF & ontology proof-of-concept editor
body:
# GRASP - ontology/RDF editor 

![GRASP screenshot](http://mud.cz/sw/GRASP_UI.png)

Developed as a part of bachelor's thesis [Visual Design of Ontologies for Semantic Web](http://mud.cz/sw/GRASP_thesis.pdf) which contains description and documentation of the editor.

## Dependencies

Raptor git://github.com/dajobe/raptor.git rev. e90515929b8ffed8a9daf67e26bb1d9a090e1971 or release after 2.0.7
Redland with Berkley DB support (tested 1.0.13)
Rasqal (tested 0.9.25)
Qt with QtSvg (tested 4.7)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
